== About us ==

The Virginia Team advocates the use of Open Source software and Ubuntu Linux in the State of Virginia.  This is done through CD Distribution, Team expansion and user-base support.

* <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntulinux.org/community/conduct/|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/VirginiaTeam/Meetings/|Virginia Team Meetings]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/VirginiaTeam/MeetingMinutes|Past Meeting Minutes]]</nowiki>

=== Events ===
* No events listed
=== Members List ===
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~virginiateam/+members|Members List]]</nowiki>

If you are interested in joining our team please apply on our launchpad page <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~virginiateam/|VirginiaTeam]]</nowiki>.  All that is required is residency in Virginia and a desire to see Ubuntu grow.

=== Monthly Reports ===

* <nowiki>[[VirginiaTeam-TeamReports|Monthly reports]]</nowiki> list our past projects and activities.
 

=== What We Will Do ===
* Educate the public about Ubuntu
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images)
* Support Ubuntu Locally
* More to come!
